Package org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.xml

Class AnnotationListConditionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.xml.AnnotationConditionHandler
      • org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.xml.AnnotationListConditionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ElementHandler<AnnotationCondition>
    public class AnnotationListConditionHandler
extends AnnotationConditionHandler
implements ElementHandler<AnnotationCondition>
    Creates an AnnotationListCondition for matching on arrays inside of annotations.

    Syntax is as follows: 

         <annotation-list-condition index="[optional attribute specified an array index]">
          [... list of subconditions that will match against this element ...]
     </annotation-list-condition>

    If the index is not specified, the condition will be applied to every item in the array. If the conditions apply to any element in the array, then the condition will be matched.

    Author:
    Jesse Sightler
